verses.verse: "Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us return <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for he has torn <S%H2963><s%> us to pieces, <S%H7495><s%> and he will heal us; <S%H5221><s%> he has injured us, <S%H2280><s%> and he will bind up our wounds.
After two days <S%H3117><s%> he will revive <S%H2421><s%> us. <S%H7992><s%> On the third day <S%H3117><s%> he will raise us up, <S%H6965><s%> and we will live <S%H2421><s%> before him. <S%H6440><s%>

Let us acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> Yahweh. <S%H7291><s%> Let us press on to know <S%H3045><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> As surely <S%H3559><s%> as the sun rises, <S%H7837><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will appear. <S%H935><s%> He will come to us like the rain, <S%H3384><s%> like the spring <S%H4456><s%> rain <S%H3384><s%> that waters the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

"Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> what shall I do <S%H6213><s%> to you? <S%H3063><s%> Judah, what shall I do <S%H6213><s%> to you? <S%H2617><s%> For your love is like a morning <S%H1242><s%> cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and like the dew <S%H2919><s%> that disappears <S%H1980><s%> early. <S%H7925><s%>

Therefore I have cut <S%H2672><s%> them to pieces with the prophets; <S%H5030><s%> I killed <S%H2026><s%> them with the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%> Your judgments <S%H4941><s%> are like a flash <S%H216><s%> of lightning. <S%H216><s%>
For I desire <S%H2654><s%> mercy, <S%H2617><s%> and not sacrifice; <S%H2077><s%> and the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> more than burnt offerings. <S%H5930><s%>
But they, <S%H120><s%> like Adam, have broken <S%H5674><s%> the covenant. <S%H1285><s%> They were unfaithful to me, <S%H898><s%> there.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is a city <S%H7151><s%> of those who work <S%H6466><s%> iniquity; <S%H205><s%> it is stained <S%H6121><s%> with blood. <S%H1818><s%>

As gangs of robbers wait <S%H2442><s%> to ambush <S%H2442><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> so the company <S%H2267><s%> of priests <S%H3548><s%> murder <S%H7523><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> toward Shechem, <S%H7926><s%> committing <S%H6213><s%> shameful crimes. <S%H2154><s%>

In the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> a horrible thing. <S%H8186><s%> There is prostitution <S%H2184><s%> in Ephraim. <S%H669><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> is defiled. <S%H2930><s%>
"Also, <S%H3063><s%> Judah, there is a harvest <S%H7105><s%> appointed <S%H7896><s%> for you, <S%H7725><s%> when I restore the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of my people. <S%H5971><s%>
